titleStmt.title: An answer to a scandalous paper, lately sent to the right Honourable the Lord Mayor, touching a late dispute intended by the Anabaptists with the Presbyterians. As also, a briefe discovery of the grosse mistakes and confused puslements of Anabaptisticall spirits in the point of rebaptising, according to Mr. Saltmarsh, in somelate [sic] exceptions here recited. With a reply to the main arguments of F.C. the great Anabaptisticall champion, / by a well-willer and daily desierer [sic] of a happy settlement of truth and peace.
titleStmt.author: Well-Willer and Daily Desierer of a Happy Settlement of Truth and Peace.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: The Lord Mayors fare-well (Wing L3050), John Saltmarsh, and Francis Cornwell.
